actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction of $1,000 for each dependent who has attained age 55 and who is a member of the taxpayer's household.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction from gross income of $1,000 for each dependent who has attained the age of 55 and is a member of the taxpayer's household. Increases the deduction to $2,000 for dependents who are blind or bedridden.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction of $1,000 for each dependent who has attained age 55 and who is a member of the taxpayer's household.
